scripts.build: npm run -w @tsumo/markdig bindings && npm run -w @tsumo/engine build && npm run -w @tsumo/engine bindings && npm run -w tsumo-cli build
scripts.typecheck: npm run -w @tsumo/markdig bindings && npm run -w @tsumo/engine typecheck && npm run -w @tsumo/engine build && npm run -w @tsumo/engine bindings && npm run -w tsumo-cli typecheck
